mapper.insert: insert into company (company_code,company_name,turnover, ceo, board_of_director, listed_in_se, sector_name, brife_write_up, stock_code, company_status) values (#{company_code},#{company_name},#{turnover}, #{ceo}, #{board_of_director}, #{listed_in_se},#{sector_name},#{brife_write_up},#{stock_code},#{company_status})
